data.name: Content Authenticity: Paving the Way Toward Trusting Media Again
data.summary:
Attend this session and learn:

How the CAI is addressing one of the core pillars of trust restoration, starting with photography

What tradeoffs exist on the journey to a widely adopted provenance solution

Why itâ€™s time to rethink traditional media forensics in the age of manipulated and synthetic media
